item.title: Alternate Installation of UBUNTU 20.1 in Gen 1 laptops
item.description: Installing UBUNTU 20.1 in Gen 1 Laptops Requirements: - UBUNTU 20.1 image on USB Booting UBUNTU 20.1 on Gen1 Laptop: - Step 1: - Insert USB into Gen 1 Laptops after installing Windows 10 Post inserting the USB keep on pressing the F2 button until the below screen appears. Select the Boot Sequence option from the settings. Step2:- Click on Add Boot Option as shown below in figure Step 3: -

item.title: Dual Boot System Configuration
item.description: Dual Booting a Laptop with Windows 10 and Ubuntu Last updated on: February 23, 2024 Requirements: Windows 10 image on USB Ubuntu 20.1 image on USB Booting Windows 10 onto laptop Insert the Windows 10 image on USB on to the laptop. Turn on the laptop and press the F12 key repeatedly until the boot menu appears. Select from the UeFi Boot menu which says uefi USB name. Windows installation appears as shown below.
